item.title: Forced to Change Expired Password When Using Ssh Key
item.author: CharlesRen
item.description: I am working in an environment where I have an account on multiple linux machines where accounts and passwords are managed independently (no active directory/LDAP/etc) and passwords expire every 30 days. As such, I thought it would be easier to manage my authentication using ssh keys. I am able to authenticate using my ssh keys just fine. However, I found that when my password expires, I am prompted to change my password when I try to connect using my ssh key.
